 # Download Acumen
  The last version of Acumen is always avalaible at [http://code.google.com/p/acumen-language/downloads/list here]. The current stable version is [http://code.google.com/p/acumen-language/downloads/detail?name=acumen_20100930.zip&can=2&q= 20100930].
 # Unzip the archive
   || On Windows      || double click on the archive                                       ||
   || On Mac          || the archive should have been automatically unzipped on the desktop ||
   || On other Unixes || run `unzip acumen_20100930.zip`                                   ||
